Text: I'm pretty sure we're at Episode 5.. Is this a pre-release or has everyone simply overlooked the typo?

There are 4 defiance episodes available on TPB, episode 1 & 2 were aired back to back and are available as 1 upload.... the second upload should have been identified as S01E03 but was uploaded as S01E02.. that's where the mistake comes from.. we're at episode 5 according to IMDB
size looks close to a full episode. only shy by 40MiB. its definitely too big for a 4 min pre-clip. my quess is typo
